verbs.description: If there [V: was] [ARG1: any doubt that California and the Trump administration are at war over environmental protection] , Gov. Jerry Brown cleared it up Tuesday .
If there was any doubt that [ARG1: California and the Trump administration] [V: are] [ARG2: at war over environmental protection] , Gov. Jerry Brown cleared it up Tuesday .
[ARGM-ADV: If there was any doubt that California and the Trump administration are at war over environmental protection] , [ARG0: Gov. Jerry Brown] [V: cleared] [ARG1: it] up [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] .
